channel.title: Blog on Parkers Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Parkers Blog

item.title: A first post
item.description: A basic blog has to have some sort of content. First thing. I don’t do any of my open source work for money. If you want to “donate” to me please make a donation to my Extra Life page. The URL redirects to my page and I keep it updated. just because I am running a blog doesn’t mean that I will have this updated on an regular basis. If anything this will be a dumping ground for stuff that I have figured out and wanted to share.
